item.description:
Enjoy FREE Brazilian yummy appetizers and Samba / Forro music and dancing!

No cover charge!

WE hope to see you there!

The Midwest Grille Restaurant is a little quaint and comfortable place.
It is not a nightclub. They are primarily a restaurant with a little bar int he back.
They are clearing some tables for dancing and offering some food for this event.

Everybody should feel very comfortable and relatively low-key.

Check out our website for details http://www.facebook.c...
We hope to see you there!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: SAMBA/FORRO DANCE PARTY AT MIDWEST GRILLE MOVED to SUN AUG 9TH!
